original: lo ; / sgom pa pos dang por zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: lo ; / sgom pa pos dang por zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: The practitioner should first perform the ritual ablutions, and so forth.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang / sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs nas yang dag par mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang / sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs nas yang dag par mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //

original: de nas yam yig tsam las rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing byin gyis brlab par yang bya ste /
analyzed: de nas yam yig tsam las rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing byin gyis brlab par yang bya ste /
translated: Then, from the mere syllable ya·πÉ, the practitioner should actualize emptiness and also bless himself.

original: smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: He should recall the aspiration.

original: de'i rjes su ram yig las byung ba'i nyi ma la h'um yig las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba /
analyzed: de'i rjes su ram yig las byung ba'i nyi ma la h'um yig las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba /

original: rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnams par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnams par bsgom par bya'o //

original: de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o //

original: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig nyis 'gyur gyi rang bzhin skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa /

analyzed: shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang dag par blta'o //

analyzed: gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la thabs kyi ngo bo mtha' yas pa 'bar ba 'phro zhing bsam par bya'o //

original: smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /

original: mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs pa /

analyzed: khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo brgya'i phyed kyi phreng ba bsnams pa /

analyzed: phyag drug pa g-yas kyi phyag rnams kyis tho ba dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje bsnams pa /

analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag gsum gyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o //

original: zhal drug pa dang po khro zhal dang / mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / ser bo dang / dmar po dang / @249b nag po rnams gzhan rnams su zhal gyi rim pas so //

analyzed: zhal thams cad ni zlum zhing dmar ba'i spyan gsum pa'o //

original: thod pa brgyad kyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu 'jigs pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can no //

original: de'i rjes la kshim dzam kham /
analyzed: de'i rjes la kshim dzam kham /

original: lam skam sam gi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po zhes pa rnams mig dang /
analyzed: lam skam sam gi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po zhes pa rnams mig dang /

analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / nu ma dag dang / lte ba zhes pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / chu skyes dang / mda' dang / rdo rje rnams phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis bsnams pa /
translated: ears, nose, tongue, breasts, and navel, holding wheels, vajras, jewels, lotuses, arrows, and vajras in their right hands.

analyzed: phyag g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /

original: de'i rjes su mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes su mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga ste /
translated: After that, the head, throat, and heart are visualized as a white lotus with eight petals, a red lotus with sixteen petals, and a blue lotus with thirty-two petals.

analyzed: sku dang gsung dang / thugs rnams su gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /

original: aom a'a:h'um zhes pa las byung ba kha dog dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / rdo rje dang / chu skyes dang / rdo rje rnams phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //

translated: He is white, red, and black, holding a vajra, lotus, and vajra in his right hands, and making the threatening mudra with his left hands.

original: de nas gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: de nas gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
